text: He sent messengers throughout Manasseh, and they, too, were summoned to follow him; he also sent messengers throughout Asher, Zebulun, and Naphtali, and they advanced to meet the others.
and he carved cherubim, palm trees, and open flowers, and plated them with gold.
These were the sons of Aaron: his son Eleazar, whose son was Phinehas, whose son was Abishua,
listen from heaven to their prayer and petition, and uphold their cause.
The beasts were distributed along the phalanxes, each elephant having assigned to it a thousand men in coats of mail, with bronze helmets on their heads, and five hundred picked cavalry.
He will not consider any restitution, nor be satisfied by your many bribes.
Be eager to hear every discourse; let no insightful saying escape you.
They neither save anyone from death, nor deliver the weak from the strong,
By now it was already late and his disciples approached him and said, “This is a deserted place and it is already very late.

But rather, love your enemies and do good to them, and lend expecting nothing back; then your reward will be great and you will be children of the Most High, for he himself is kind to the ungrateful and the wicked.
Jesus said to them, “I am the bread of life; whoever comes to me will never hunger, and whoever believes in me will never thirst.
